column4: Does anyone know what this is: First I switch user and later logout. The screen goes plain white. I can't see a login prompt or anything, to use the other account. Should that be?
just got that a few seconds ago.
had it happen to me a few minutes ago, had to restart gdm to fix it.
Peanut: lusepuster: Sorry, I've got a lot to learn just to understand what was just said about compiz and  gdm and that stuff. :) Greenieguy, you see
